Blurbs.txt__18: Time to erase you up for good!
Blurbs.txt__27: Build up yer TP to use APPREHENSION.
Blurbs.txt__28: Lower yer opponent's HP to make it easier to catch 'em.
Blurbs.txt__33: Here's the power of the number one!
Blurbs.txt__45: There is a dirt spot there...
Blurbs.txt__76: So it has come to this...
Blurbs.txt__77: Lightners...@Do you want to know so badly what will happen?
Blurbs.txt__79: We will all return to darkness.
Blurbs.txt__81: This world...@That has only become aware today...
Blurbs.txt__82: Is this what you want to happen?
Blurbs.txt__83: You abandoned us in this dark place...@For a long, long time...
Blurbs.txt__84: And as soon as we become aware, you want to put us back down?!
Blurbs.txt__85: NO! I say! I will not allow it!
Blurbs.txt__86: Lightners!@I will fight you until the bitter end!
Blurbs.txt__87: I will not return to the darkness!
Blurbs.txt__90: And you will have no say on it!
Blurbs.txt__98: STAY STILL SO I CAN SHOOT YOU.
Blurbs.txt__101: IF ONLY I HAD MY OTHER HAND, YOU'D BE [toast].
Blurbs.txt__103: SURRENDER, AND I WON'T HURT YOU [much].
Blurbs.txt__106: PLEASE CO-OPERATE SO YOUR TERMINATION CAN BE SWIFT.
Blurbs.txt__125: You in need for a fixin'?
CommonText.txt__82: Select a file to copy to
CommonText.txt__95: Press F12 to reset@keys to default@at anytime.
CommonText.txt__121: INTERACT: Punch@CANCEL: Defend@MENU: Kanako's Healing Bell ([VALUE]% TP)
Enemies.txt__2: check:* It looks like a cactus, but it isn't.
Enemies.txt__6: check:* Not the sharpest tool in the shed.
Enemies.txt__10: check:* Seems to have a thing for raising reptiles.
Enemies.txt__14: check:* The caretaker of the currently empty Dark Jail.;* You somewhat feel he is familiar in a way.
Enemies.txt__18: check:* Criminal wanted in 3 Dark Worlds for stealing,\n\tarson and styling his mustache without a permit.;* Always thought he was number one no matter what.
Enemies.txt__22: check:* Cleaners of Bearing's Fortress, spends most\n\tof the time mopping in the employee rooms.
Enemies.txt__26: check:* The tyrant ruler of this Dark World.\n* A little worn down.;* Crimes: Tyrany, torture, gouging prices and\n\tterrorizing wildlife.
Enemies.txt__30: check:* The "executor" working for Bearing.\n* Fan of classical tunes.;* Crimes: Being a nuisance, noise outside allowed\n\thours and noise near sensitive areas.
Enemies.txt__34: check:* A familiar(?) foe.\n* Watch out for the foxfire.
Enemies.txt__38: check:* The mascot of Ketsukane Electronics.\n* What is he doing here?
Enemies.txt__42: check:* Just another cog in the machine.
Enemies.txt__46: check:* More bite than bark.\n* Don't get pinned down!
Enemies.txt__50: check:* Current leader of Robotopia and a bit of a hot head.\n* Hates being called short.;* Crimes: Rigging elections, fraud, jaywalking.
Enemies.txt__54: check:* Kanako's old friend. Not as clean as she looks.;* Crimes: Assault with Weapon, harassment, deceiving locals.
Enemies.txt__58: check:* A wannabe judge who thinks can boss others around.;* Crimes: Fearmongering, stalking, blackmail.
Enemies.txt__62: check:* Workers of the factory, tries to fix things but\n\talways end up screwing themselves.
Enemies.txt__66: check:* An all terrain tank with infinite potential,\n\tand they will drill that into your head.
Enemies.txt__70: check:* They try their hardest to keep everything in line around here,\n\teven if no one stands up to it.
Items.txt__8: descriptionDW:A pink phone with a cute bell charm.\nUSE to make calls.
Items.txt__18: descriptionDW:Heals a fallen ally to MAX HP. A minty green crystal.
Items.txt__29: descriptionDW:A small golden, round bell. It jingles when shaken.
Items.txt__42: descriptionDW:A vest with bright reflective strips on it, sure to warn others of your presence.
Items.txt__54: descriptionDW:Goggles sure to shield your eyes against blinding lights.
Items.txt__66: descriptionDW:A familiar, but weirdly different necklace. Feels magical.
Items.txt__78: descriptionDW:A staff adorned with a fox head ornament at the end.
Items.txt__89: descriptionDW:An oversized screwdriver that can be yielded like a club. Packs a punch!
Items.txt__101: descriptionDW:A steam powered glove, not wearable by organics. Give it to a machine.
Items.txt__111: descriptionDW:A heavy metallic hand with rockets on the side, packs quite the punch.
Items.txt__122: descriptionDW:A hand from Axis' upgraded body. Made to withstand damage.
Items.txt__132: descriptionDW:A medal that shines brightly despite the surrounding darkness.
Items.txt__143: descriptionDW:A small pin with a face of a smiling mascot bear. Fills you with warm feelings.
Items.txt__166: descriptionDW:Raises TP to full in battle.
Items.txt__171: descriptionDW:A large candy in the shape of a plastic building brick. Full of sugar. HP + 40
Items.txt__183: descriptionDW:A crunchy tasty rock that pops in your mouth. Sure to stimulate anyone. HP + 100
Items.txt__195: descriptionDW:A heavy spiked club. Great for bludgeoning enemies.
Items.txt__207: descriptionDW:A pistol that shoots corks at enemies. Shouldn't deal lasting damage.
Items.txt__219: descriptionDW:A laser powered rifle, looks pretty futuristic.
Items.txt__231: descriptionDW:Sketches of the many wanted criminals in the Dark Worlds. USE to see.
Items.txt__235: descriptionDW:A homegrown, healthy gun. Shoots peas.
Items.txt__247: descriptionDW:A regular, sturdy, completely normal softball bat. Surprising to find here.
Items.txt__261: descriptionDW:A fancy lunch fit for an entire group. Restores the entire party's HP by 150.
Items.txt__264: |Woah, fancy...|I RATE IT A 8.8/10.|Wow... Thanks...|Man, I'm stuffed!
Letters.txt__2:
text:Hey you [sir or madam]!

Looking for the hottest bargains?! Then come to Mo's!
Only today, we are having an all out sale! Everything just ■■% off!

We will be waiting for you!
Letters.txt__7:
text:Hey sleepyhead!

Did you manage to sleep at all tonight? My head is still spinning from yesterday.

I'm sending this letter so you don't sleep too much! I'll go pick you up, so wait for me!
[right]- Kanako
Letters.txt__12:
text:Don't forget to bring the "explosives" tonight.

I'll be waiting for you at the same spot as last night. Come over once you have them.

Come alone.
[right]- Virgil
Letters.txt__16: text:Let's head back into the Dark Jail after class.\n\nThe Warden might know where the other Dark Worlds are.
Letters.txt__22:
text:Cole,

We received word that you again rang the school bell without permission and outside permitted hours.
Now I know that you kids love doing these "pranks", but a citizen left town because of that.
Please refrain from doing it again or I will have to talk to Martlet about it.

[right]- Mayor Starlo

Posters.txt__1:
text:[center]WANTED: LORD BEARING THE TYRANT[/center]

Ruler of Bearing's Domain. Is known to punish those that disagree with him. Hates lightners with a passion.

Crimes: Tyrany, torture, gouging prices and terrorizing wildlife.
Posters.txt__7:
text:[center]WANTED: PENNILTON THE PINCHER[/center]

This darkner has been involved into multiple thefts in 3 different Dark Worlds. If you see him, do not accept his offers no matter what.

Crimes: Stealing, arson and styling his mustache without a permit.
Posters.txt__13:
text:[center]WANTED: RINGO THE TORTURER[/center]

The tone deaf maestro of Bearing's army. While he is short on words, he makes up with the noise his head can produce.

Crimes: Being a nuisance, noise outside allowed hours and noise near sensitive areas.
Posters.txt__19:
text:[center]WANTED: TOSTER THE POSER[/center]

A fugitive from another Dark World, managed to climb to the top by rigging and cheating elections.

Crimes: Rigging elections, fraud, jaywalking.
Posters.txt__25:
text:[center]WANTED: ?????[/center]

Details unknown. This darkner was recently spotted around dark alleyways, stalking civilians with almost no discretion. Elusive and hard to find.

Crimes: Fearmongering, stalking, blackmail.
Posters.txt__31:
text:[center]WANTED: ?????[/center]

Details unknown. Witness reports state this darkner has been using a metal bat to beat up innocent people. Wears a cloak.

Crimes: Assault with Weapon, harassment, deceiving locals.
Titles.txt__2: Robot:Artificial being. Doesn't have a SOUL.
Titles.txt__3: Leader:Commands the party with various ACTs.
Titles.txt__7: Magic Warrior:Hits hard but supports with magic.
Titles.txt__8: Demoted Bot:Was huge, now small again.
